price: 79 S’agissant du bateau, il appartenait à de pauvres travailleurs de la mer. J’ai voulu l’endommager car ils allaient au-devant d’un roi qui s’emparait de force de toute embarcation en bon état.
arabic: أَمَّا ٱلسَّفِينَةُ فَكَانَتۡ لِمَسَٰكِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ فَأَرَدتُّ أَنۡ أَعِيبَهَا وَكَانَ وَرَآءَهُم مَّلِكٞ يَأۡخُذُ كُلَّ سَفِينَةٍ غَصۡبٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ammā al-safīnatu fakānat limasākīna yaʿmalūna fī al-baḥri fa-aradttu an aʿībahā wakāna warāahum malikun yakhudhu kulla safīnatin ghaṣban
